headline: S&P 500: Market Corrections Are Great Opportunities For Alpha
summary: The S&P 500 nears correction territory amid AI stock sell-offs and high valuations. Read here for our bearish outlook and market insights.

headline: The Wall Street bosses who aren't hitting the panic button on Trump policies despite new worries
summary: Some of the biggest bosses on Wall Street aren't hitting the panic button on President Trump's policies  despite the recent gyration in markets, even as they acknowledge some new concerns from the business world.

headline: Blackstone to buy 40% stake in India's Kolte-Patil Developers for $134 million
summary: Kolte-Patil will allot a Blackstone entity 14.3% preferential shares in a deal worth 4.17 billion rupees, while its controlling shareholders will sell another 25.7% to the U.S. firm for about 7.5 billion rupees.  According to Indian market regulations, the sale will trigger a so-called open offer for Blackstone to buy up to 26% shares from existing shareholders.
